title: War room dashboard
description: Live view of bots, tasks, blockers; health status (R/Y/G).

title: Knowledge graph (entities + links)
description: Track people/companies/projects/decisions; link tasks↔research↔artifacts.

title: Security: optional IP allowlist for admin/API
description: Add workspace-level allowlist and middleware check. Include config UI + env override.

title: Secrets vault (team + bot scoped)
description: Store secrets encrypted; scope to team and optionally bot.

title: Incident + audit trails (enhanced)
description: Full trace of tasks/decisions; diff history on plans and artifacts.

title: Bot resume state
description: Persist bot job state to resume after restarts.

title: Cost + ROI analytics
description: Track time saved, tasks completed, estimated value created.

title: Unified search across tasks/logs/artifacts/research
description: Single search UI and API across all entities.

title: Global task router + priority queues
description: Auto-assign tasks based on capabilities, load, SLA; retries and backoff.

title: Kanban priorities board (shared with Boss)
description:
Build a Kanban-style priority board inside Whale for daily execution.

Requirements (v1):
- Board UI with columns: Backlog / This Week / Today / In Progress / Waiting / Done
- Drag+drop cards between columns + reorder within column
- Cards can link to existing Beads issues (first-class) AND support ad-hoc tasks
- Filters by project/tag; quick add; Top-3 focus view
- Persist board state
- Integrate with daily standup + routines (email drafting, etc.)

Notes:
- Multi-tenancy later, but structure should allow per-user boards.

title: Bot-to-bot dependency tracking
description: Represent waiting-on relationships; show in bot work state and project views.

title: Policy + safety layer
description: Per-team permissions, approval gates for risky actions, least-privilege enforcement.

title: Add signed requests + device-scoped bot tokens
description: Implement signed request verification for bot API calls; bind tokens to device/host and rotate/expire tokens. Update pairing flow and bot auth middleware.

title: Convex codegen: make _generated consistent and automated
description: Right now Whale uses a lightweight checked-in Convex `_generated` surface plus a custom meta generator. Add a repeatable codegen flow (CI + dev script) that produces correct runtime exports (`api`, `internal`, `components`) and better-convex metadata/types without manual hacks.

title: Community intel monitor (OpenClaw ecosystem)
description: Every ~10 minutes: track releases/docs/Discord/GitHub/projects; summarize into Whale.

title: Bot auto-update + release notes tracking
description: Add auto_update flag to bots; auto-update on new OpenClaw releases; store versions + notes in Whale.

title: Artifact hub
description: Central storage for bot outputs with metadata, access control, and search.

title: Implement encryption-at-rest for secrets (aiApiKey)
description: Workspaces store aiApiKey in plaintext. Add encryption-at-rest and key management (env key). Migrate existing values.

title: Reporting dashboard: daily/weekly summaries + bot activity
description: Add reporting endpoints + UI: tasks completed per day/week, project status snapshot, bot activity log.

title: Mission queue lanes: inbox/assigned/active/review/waiting/done
description: Implement a true multi-lane mission queue (like Mission Control screenshots): lane semantics, counts, drag/drop or transitions, and routing rules. Current dashboard only shows heuristic recommendations and needs a richer queue model.

title: Mission statements: mirror to SQLite + audit history
description: Mission statements are currently stored in Convex for the UI. Decide the source-of-truth (SQLite/Drizzle vs Convex) and implement mirroring, migrations, and audit/history semantics (edit vs append-only).

title: Playbooks (repeatable workflows)
description: Templates for common workflows; one-click run by bots.

title: Cross-team sharing (bots/artifacts)
description: Share bot or artifact with another team with explicit permissions.

title: Bot activity logs + current work state
description: Store per-bot logs (actions, outputs, artifacts) and current work (active tasks, projects, blockers, waiting-on).

title: Bots: multi-team membership + transfer between teams
description: Allow bots to belong to multiple teams and be moved between teams with audit trail + permission checks.

title: Multi-tenancy: Accounts, Teams, memberships
description: Add Account -> Team -> resources model. Each account starts with default team; users can create multiple teams. Roles per team.

title: Bot onboarding SOP acknowledgement
description: On first connect, Whale sends guidelines/SOP; bot must acknowledge before receiving tasks.

title: Bot status state machine
description: Implement bot lifecycle states: offline→idle→working→waiting→error→recovering. Tie transitions to heartbeat + task lifecycle.
